properties.Name: PaymentType
properties.Description:
A type of payment made in relationship to a Payment Schedule.

Ex:
- Scheduled Payment (Single Installment)
- Partial Payment
- Mortgage Payment
- Loan Payment
- Interest Payment
- Interest on overdue payment
- Advance Payment
- Interim Payment
- Fee Payment
- Amortization Payment
- Balloon Payment
- Forbearance Repayment
- Late Payment Charge
- Pre-payment
- Additional Principal Payment
- Transfer Funds To Escrow Account
- Property Tax Payment
- Mortgage Insurance Payment
- Hazard Insurance Payment
- Flood Insurance Payment

Columns.Name: PaymentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment Type.

Columns.Name: PaymentTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Payment Type.

Columns.Name: PaymentTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Payment Type.
